name: Salvador Faria
summary: Startup experience. Agile software development in Internet scale applications (with source control, dev/stage/prod release cycle, data migrations, continuous deployment). Developed backend services using programming languages like Python, PHP and Java, and frontend programming with JavaScript and popular libraries like JQuery

recomendations.Author: Shay Rojansky
recomendations.text: Salvador is a great web engineer with great technical aptitude and a very flexible skillset. He is eager to learn new technologies and easily adapted to new challenges. He is an excellent web backend developer (Python, Linux...), who has also mastered cutting-edge frontend technologies and has a great understanding of how the web works - both technically and non-technically. Finally, he is also a very reliable team member and a great person to have around socially.
